titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997 the duty on 2-(4-chloro-2-methyl phenoxy) propionic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on 2-(4-chloro-2- methyl phenoxy) propionic acid.
